content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]
  • Working meeting: Kosovo Road Safety Forum comes up with concrete proposals for measures to be taken in 2015, December 24, 2014;
  • Working meeting: Kosovo Road Safety Forum unveils activities carried out in the first five months of 2015, May 14, 2015;
  • Working meeting: Kosovo Road Safety Forum discusses the alarming state of road safety during September 2015, September 18, 2015;
  • Working meeting: Kosovo Road Safety Forum calls for public institutions to finally take concrete action and in conjunction with other relevant mechanisms to take concrete punitive measures to provide a safe environment for all road participants, December 24, 2015;
  • Working meeting: Kosovo Road Safety Forum unveils calendar of activities for 2019, 5 December 2018;
  • Roundtable discussion: “Zero Road Accidents Vision”, May 31, 2016;
  • Roundtable discussion: The state of road safety in the Municipalities of Mitrovica, Vushtrri and Skenderaj, 15 June 2016;
  • Roundtable discussion: “Existing status of Kosovo Railways and Integration into the European Rail Network”, 26 August 2016;
  • Roundtable discussion: “Roundabouts in Kosovo, facilitation or difficulty for sustainable mobility”, 16 September 2016;
  • Roundtable discussion “Analysis of safety situation on Kosovo roads”, 1 August 2018.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][stm_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”100″ width=”100%”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
